name: Fluid Template
description: A base app for starting your own web store, or learning how to integrate Fluid into your existing site.

FLUID_API_TOKEN.description: The api token for the Fluid API.

FLUID_BASE_URL.description: The base url of the Fluid API.

FONTAWESOME_NPM_AUTH_TOKEN.description: The npm auth token for FontAwesome.

scripts.postinstall: echo '${FONTAWESOME_NPM_AUTH_TOKEN}' && ~/.npmrc && yarn && yarn build && yarn start
